title: FS - T206 A Pink Chase, a Tolstoi (sold), and an SLer.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS - T206 A Pink Chase, a Tolstoi (sold), and an SLer.
posts.post_content:
For Sale - A nice mix of T206's, prices include shipping, please PM if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: I have to collect 6.75% ST from any NC resident in addition to any agreed upon price.

T206 Pink Chase Piedmont 150 - PSA 3 (mk), the mk results from a wet sheet transfer, the word Piedmont can partially be seen in the upper left portion of the card.  $320 venmo no fee or $332.50 pp gs.

T206 Harry McIntyre, Bkln and Chicago Nat'l, Tolstoi - SGC 2.  $old

T206 Jimmy Hart Southern Leaguer, Piedmont 350 - SGC 4 (super sharp card).  $240 venmo no fee or $250 pp gs.

T206 Hooks Wiltse Portrait, No Cap,  Piedmont 150 - SGC 4.  $170 venmo no fee or $176 pp gs.
